title: PBE Problems
body:
Ok i had been accepted for the pbe for a while now and here something i noticed. Every time i  play it always lags.
like have this ever happen to any of you guys. I live on the east coast and my ping on pbe is always so high but only on pbe .when i play on live servers my ping is a 72 . I know its not my internet all the time,Is this a problem with the pbe server? 
i really wish this would stop happening the pbe has become really not fun to play on because of this. 
If this ever happened to anyone pleasee tell me your experience with it

replies.body: Nope! But I've signed up so thanks for the heads up i'll keep a eye for it if I get accepted to help!

> [{quoted}](name=ObliviousDreams,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qGNpEXPV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-13T18:45:07.245+0000)
>
> Nope! But I've signed up so thanks for the heads up i'll keep a eye for it if I get accepted to help!

No problem man,hope you get in!.

Hey SwaggerJaxPro,

In the future, please use the [PBE boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe) for issues relating to the PBE. It helps us better separate issues occurring on live versus PBE. :[

Are you experiencing lag, or FPS drops?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qGNpEXPV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-13T18:42:11.853+0000)
>
> Hey SwaggerJaxPro,
> 
> In the future, please use the [PBE boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe) for issues relating to the PBE. It helps us better separate issues occurring on live versus PBE. :[
> 
> Are you experiencing lag, or FPS drops?

Oh dang i completely forgot about that  thanks for telling me!
